resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73060</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73060</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40aee8f8-82bc-419c-25c2-712f5819e3a9#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Martin Schongauer: Fájdalmas Krisztus Szűz Máriával és Evangélista Szent Jánossal, 1470-75, Bécs, Albertina grafikai gyűjtemény, 22,3x15,7 cm, rézmetszet.</string>
            <string language="en">Martin Schongauer: Paintful Jesus Christ with Blessed Virgin and Saint John the Evangelist, 1470-75, Vienna, Graphic Collection of Albertina, 22,3 x 15,7cm, copper engraving</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Martin Schongauer: Paintful Jesus Christ mit
gesegneter Jungfrau und Heiligem Johannes der Evangelist, 1470-75, 
Wien, graphische Ansammlung von Albertina, 22.3 x 15,7cm, kupferner 
Stich</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Martin Schongauer : Paintful Jésus le 
Christ avec la Vierge et le saint John bénis l'évangéliste, 
1470-75, Vienne, collection graphique d'Albertina, 22.3 x 15,7cm, 
gravure de cuivre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Martin Schongauer: Paintful Jesus Christ com
virgin e o saint john blessed o evangelist, 1470-75, Viena, coleção 
gráfica de Albertina, 22.3 x 15,7cm, engraving de cobre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Martin Schongauer: Paintful Jesus Christ 
con il virgin e john santo benedetti il evangelist, 1470-75, Vienna, 
accumulazione grafica di Albertina, 22.3 x 15,7cm, incisione di rame</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Μαρτην Schongauer: Paintful Ιησούς 
Χριστός με την ευλογημένους Virgin και Αγιο John 
evangelist, 1470-75, Βιέννη, γραφική συλλογή της Αλμπερτίνα,
22.3 X 15,7cm, χάραξη χαλκού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Martin Schongauer: Paintful Jesús Cristo 
con la Virgen y santo Juan bendecidos el Evangelista, 1470-75, Viena, 
colección gráfica de Albertina, 22.3 el x 15,7cm, grabado de cobre</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Csúcsíves ablakkeretben látható a Fájdalmas Krisztus, mellette kétoldalt Mária és Evangélista Szent János, felettük angyalok</string>
            <string language="en">In the pointed window frame there is Paintful Jesus Christ,on both sides there are Maria and Saint John the Evangelist, above them there are angels.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Martin Schongauer,  rézmetszet,  Szent János,  Fájdalmas Krisztus,  Evangélista Szent János,  Mária,  15. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Martin Schongauer,  copper engraving,  Saint John,  Paintful Jesus Christ, Saint John the Evangelist,  Maria,  15. century,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im spitzen Fensterfeld gibt es Paintful Jesus 
Christ, auf beiden Seiten gibt es Maria und Heiliger Johannes der 
Evangelist, über ihnen dort sind Engel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la trame aiguë de fenêtre il y a de 
Paintful Jésus le Christ, des deux côtés il y a Maria et saint John
l'évangéliste, au-dessus d'eux là sont des anges.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">No frame pointed da janela há Paintful Jesus 
Christ, em ambos os lados há Maria e saint john o evangelist, acima 
deles lá é angels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel telaio aguzzo della finestra ci è Paintful 
Jesus Christ, da entrambi i lati ci è Maria e john santo il 
evangelist, sopra loro là è angeli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο δειγμένο πλαίσιο παραθύρων υπάρχει Paintful 
Ιησούς Χριστός, και στις δύο πλευρές υπάρχει η Μαρία και Αγιος 
John evangelist, επάνω από τους υπάρχουν άγγελοι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el marco acentuado de la ventana hay Paintful 
Jesús Cristo, en ambas caras hay Maria y santo Juan el Evangelista, 
sobre ellas allí es ángeles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Martin Schongauer, kupferner Stich, Heiliger Johannes, Paintful 
Jesus Christ, Heiliger Johannes der Evangelist, Maria, Jahrhundert 
15.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Martin Schongauer, gravure de cuivre, saint John, Paintful 
Jésus le Christ, saint John l'évangéliste, Maria, siècle 15.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Martin Schongauer, engraving de cobre, saint john, Paintful 
Jesus Christ, saint john o evangelist, Maria, século 15.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Martin Schongauer, incisione di rame, john santo, Paintful Jesus
Christ, john santo il evangelist, Maria, secolo 15.,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Μαρτην Schongauer, χάραξη χαλκού, Αγιος John, 
Paintful Ιησούς Χριστός, Αγιος John evangelist, Μαρία, 
αιώνας 15,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Martin Schongauer, grabado de cobre, santo Juan, Paintful Jesús
Cristo, santo Juan el Evangelista, Maria, siglo 15.,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
